colophon.title: Colophon
colophon.para: This book was created using free/open source software. All media within was created and saved in formats unencumbered by patents.

The standard typeface used in this book is Source Sans Pro
Source Sans Pro Announcement (2012-08-02):
, the monospaced sequences use Source Code Pro.
Source Code Pro Announcement (2012-09-24):
Both of these beautiful fonts families were designed by Paul D. Hunt
Paul D. Hunt on Adobe.com:
at Adobe Systems Incorporated. Moreover, both of these families are available for use under the Open Font License version 1.1
SIL Open Font License:
.

This book was written in 100% lint-free DocBook 5 XML
DocBook 5: The Definitive Guide:
.

Composition of this book took place entirely in Emacs (nXML/RNG mode if you're curious), on an assortment of Fedora Linux
Visit the Fedora Project Homepage:
releases ranging from Fedora 11, Leonidas, to Fedora 23 (first edition published).

The single-page HTML version of this book
Single-page HTML: is based off of Twitter Bootstrap
Twitter Bootstrap: stylesheet.

The print and PDF versions of this book were produced using an
xsltproc → dblatex → xetex → xdvipdfmx toolchain.
